org.springframework.cloud.dataflow.registry.service

Class DefaultAppRegistryService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.cloud.dataflow.registry.service.DefaultAppRegistryService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AppRegistryService

    @Transactional
public class DefaultAppRegistryService
extends Object
implements AppRegistryService
    Convenience wrapper for the AppRegistryService that operates on higher level DefaultAppRegistryService objects and supports on-demand loading of Resources.

    Stores AppRegistration with up to two keys:

    • <type>.<name>: URI for the actual app
    • <type>.<name>.metadata: Optional URI for the app metadata
    Author:
    Mark Fisher, Gunnar Hillert, Thomas Risberg, Eric Bottard, Ilayaperumal Gopinathan, Oleg Zhurakousky, Christian Tzolov, Chris Schaefer

                                                         URI metadataURI)
        Builds a Stream from key/value mapping.
        Parameters:
        kv - key/value representing app key (key) and app URI (value)
        metadataURI - metadataUri computed from a given app key
        Returns:
        • valid AppRegistration as single element Stream
        • silently ignores well malformed metadata entries (0 element Stream) or
        • fails otherwise.
